product_description: The go-to cardigan that everyone needs in the closet, this lightweight look features an easy-wearing high/low silhouette.
product_details_and_care:
The go-to cardigan that everyone needs in the closet, this lightweight look features an easy-wearing high/low silhouette.
26" front length; 32 1/2" back length (size Medium)
Front button closure
Collarless
Long sleeves
48% polyester, 47% rayon, 5% spandex
Hand wash, dry flat
Imported
Point of View
Item #5628058
product_size_info:
Regular: Runs large; if between sizes, order one size down.
Petite: True to size.
Regular & Petite (P): XXS=00, XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16, XXL=18 (14W-16W).
